lines: Highly motivated computer science graduate student at Indiana University Bloomington (Class of 2021).

projects.name: Expense Tracker
lines: An application to track personal expenses, implemented with containerized microservices.
Deployed the system on Google Cloud Run through a CI/CD pipeline set up with Google Cloud Build and GitHub.

projects.name: Word2Vec
lines: Utilized a Neural Network for implementing the word2vec algorithm using TensorFlow and generate word embeddings from a large text corpus.

projects.name: Easy Connect
lines: A cross-platform mobile application for researchers to easily connect and communicate with each other.
Utilized research papers to provide recommendations based on computed cosine-similarity.

projects.name: Sentence Length Distribution Analysis
lines: Used Google Cloud Functions to create a serverless application and provide sentence length distribution analysis.
Reduced the computation cost of the application by designing and adding a caching system using Cloud Firestore.

projects.name: Distributed MapReduce System
lines: Designed, developed, and deployed a generalized MapReduce framework on Google Cloud with parallel computation functionality among the dynamically created virtual machines for mapper/reducer tasks.
Built a Memcached system for the MapReduce system, to implement a command-based consistent data storage on the network.

projects.name: Weather Forecasting System
lines: Developed a weather forecasting system and deployed the system in a Kubernetes cluster using a CI/CD pipeline built with Travis CI and GitHub.

Implemented asynchronous communication between containerized microservices using Apache Kafka, and added Istio’s Service mesh to improve security, load balancing, and information gathering of the deployed system.

projects.name: NYC Taxi Data Analysis
lines: Conducted research followed by data exploration, data preparation, and visualization based on NYC Taxi data using MySQL.
Designed and utilized a multivariate linear regression model to predict the total fare of various taxi trips.

projects.name: Volunteer Management System
lines: A social network-based event management system, built by following the scrum agile methodology, helping volunteers to be aware of near-by events and helping the organizations to reach out to volunteers more effectively.

projects.name: Spam Classification
lines: Implemented a Naïve Bayes Classifier to detect spam email using its content.

projects.name: Healthcare Management and Monitoring System
lines: A system to maintain and provide the e-records of a patient’s medical data with RFID based authentication.
Developed an android application to allow users to access medical details and book/maintain appointments.
